introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy describes how Ring Platform collects, uses, and protects your personal information.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, update your profile, or communicate with us.
dataCollection.item2: Usage data and interaction with our platform
dataCollection.item3: Communication data when you contact us
dataCollection.item4: Technical data including IP address and browser information

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, communicate with you, and ensure platform security.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You can also opt out of certain communications and data collection.

contactUsPrivacy.title: Contact Us
contactUsPrivacy.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@ring.ck.ua
